Reference

All functions

clinical.ranksum()

Compute associations between gene set/module and patient clinical variables

cohort_boxplot()

PLot bxoplot distribution of ranksum for a defined gene set according to ROI categories

cohort_heatmap()

Plot reordered heatmap according to sig.ranksum output

cohort_scatterplot()

Plot scatterplot of ranksums

functional.enrichment()

Functional enrichment analyses for genes partitioned by sig.ranksum()

read.gmt.msigdb()

Read MSigdb gmt files

sig.ranksum()

Patient linear ordering based on gene set expression

stat.ranksum()

Compute association between gene sets/modules across tissues
